short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu to paste repetitive code review comments. Comes with default sets of comments such as SOLID and Clean Code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a convenient menu to any text field where you can find pre-built messages regarding potential code smells, architectural issues or more. Use this extension in code review fields in GitLab, GitHub or any other code review tool to simplify your code review process.
